title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 18.7 - Vehicle identification numbers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 18.7 - Vehicle identification numbers

State Regulations
A local authority may sell an abandoned vehicle without a
vehicle identification number plate to a registered scrap processor or a
certified vehicle dismantler only. Vehicles sold to anyone other than a
registered or certified scrap processor must contain a public vehicle
identification number plate. To obtain a new vehicle identification number, the
local authority should apply to the Department of Motor Vehicles, Office of

Field Investigation, Empire State Plaza, Albany, NY 12228. Form MV-272.1 must
be used to request a vehicle identification number. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
18.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
